name: Key Dawn
description:
Description:

Headphones recommended. This is a basic experimental game. An attempt to create a nice ambiance with sounds and images. There is no goal in this game. Its my first game published on itch.io :)

Controls:

Arrow keys.

Issues:

On some older keyboards, only two arrow keys can be pressed at once. This is a limitation of the hardware. Try to connect another keyboard to get the fullest experience.

Credits:

Keyboard keys assets modified from original visuals by Gerald Burke. Music made with BeepBox. I am grateful to GameDev.tv for their amazing courses that made this game possible.
